tweet: The @warriors Game Two against the Rockets is tonight. Go Warriors!!

As Chair of the House Ways and Means Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures, I will continue to work to support the enactment of a plan that helps to rebuild our infrastructure for the 21st Century. https://www.politico.com/story/2019/04/30/schumer-pelosi-trump-infrastructure-plan-1293303 …
I have met with community leaders from across our district who all agreed we need to make major investments in our local infrastructure.
Today’s bipartisan infrastructure meeting at the White House was a good first step and I am heartened to hear both sides agreed to work together on a $2 trillion plan.

Sat down with Greg Armstrong from Martinez, Kurt and Nadia Brinkman from Vallejo and Greg Long from Napa who are in DC with the National Electrical Contractors Association to discuss what we can do to increase retirement security for workers. Thanks for stopping by! pic.twitter.com/n7koZQQCzF

Ellen Tauscher was a good friend and an incredible public servant, someone who represented her district well for many years and served honorably in the State Department under Pres. Obama. I was honored to work with her. She will be greatly missed by our state and our nation.

ICYMI the CDC will get $25 million to study gun violence and research public health policy to combat this deadly crisis. PG&E customers – PG&E is warning of a phone scam where callers demand payment for supposedly past-due bills & threaten to disconnect your electricity. If you receive this call, hang up & call local police or contact PG&E at 1-800-743-5000. Never give out personal info by phone! pic.twitter.com/pKyp5sOTHc

Proud to reintroduce the bipartisan & bicameral Earthquake Mitigation Incentive and Tax Parity Act, allowing homeowners to retrofit their homes to better withstand earthquakes. This saves taxpayers money, keeps people safer and saves the government money during disaster cleanup.

Nearly 5 years ago, our district was rocked by the South Napa Earthquake, which left more than 1,500 homes seriously damaged. Disasters in our district and across our nation are devastating and we must do everything we can right now to prepare and mitigate their harmful impacts.
